title: Unstable pings , HELP!!!
body: My ping on my pc goes up to 200 ms few days ago(around Wednesday I guess ), and it is very unstable sometime 60 sometime 193, here is some interesting fact:  the ping on my mac is very stable on 64(same internet), dont know why, pls help{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  Thank you!!

replies.body: Your ping spiking up like this could be caused to your network having a connection issue to our servers or packet loss.  I recommend running our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will help find out what's going wrong as well as provide a series of troubleshoot steps.  Give it a go and let me know if you have any questions!
I know is network issue, but why the game works fine on my mac?
